intent_template: Add {{quantity}} of {{item}} from this page to my shopping cart.
intent: Add enough to have 48 bars of the item that most looks like the image from this page to my shopping cart.

instantiation_dict.item: the item that most looks like the image

program_html.locator: lambda:(() => {try {return Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.item-info')).find(el => el.textContent.includes('Protein Wafer Peanut Butter - Box of 12 Bars, Peanut Butter, 12 Count')).querySelector('input').getAttribute('data-item-qty')} catch (e) {return ' '}})()
